section.title: Dashboard Customization Uses JSON
section.para:
Dashboard customization is done by expressing a customized UI experience in JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) and uploading the JSON text from the inBloom administration page for the dashboard. The
describes how to find and use all available dashboard customization points you can use. For a general reference on JSON, see json.org. Even though a text editor is sufficient to compose JSON, consider using an editor that has built-in formatting tools and validation for the JSON syntax.
